QuestData.Title: Fighting With Fire
QuestData.Description:
Excellent! Now that we have these lovely Liquid Fire flasks prepared we have one last thing to do:
Test them out!
There are some of those large abominations lurking about in the woods above my home. I think they would make excellent test subjects for our little alchemical experiment, wouldn't you say?
QuestData.LogDescription: Test the Liquid Fire flasks on $oa Briarwood Bulwarks.
QuestData.RewardText: I tried to stop them but I couldn't. They've taken Master Ashton into the woods!
